body:
I'm done with this server. Avicore is no where near up to par as Mczone.


Every single map is bad.
Kits are bad IMO.
Feels like Controll the Hill but in different spots on the map.


I don't feel like discussing anything. Maybe I'll comeback if nexus fixes their shit but you know.


Cya one day.

-ViolentBoo

Edit:

After watching Free To Play (It's On Youtube) I realized what a horrible mistake I've made. I've thought as everyone here as my team and I have never made so many freinds in my life. This server changed the way I think of my acts everyday. You were all there for almost two years and I just abandon you all?

What kind of freind am I?


I'll comeback, and I'm sorry if I offended the server in anyway. I was just frustrated at the game.
